sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"损害，伤害"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: hurt, injure, wound, harm, damage, disable
means: hurt ： 普通用词，较口语化，侧重指给有生命的东西造成机体上或精神、感情上的或轻或重的伤害。
injure较hurt正式，多用于有生命的事物。既可指伤害别人的事物。即可指伤害别人的健康、外貌、自尊心、名誉等，又可指使别人受伤或东西受损，同时含有受伤害部分至少暂时丧失功能的意味。
wound ： 专指对身体的重伤，尤指在战斗中受的伤，强调外部创伤；也可指精神方面的伤害。
harm ： 主要用于有生命的东西，语气略强于injure，指引起严重的痛苦和损伤；有时也用于抽象事物，指造成任何不良后果。
damage ： 通常指对无生命物体的损害，并有降低其价值，破坏其功能等的后果。

sentence.Network_en: I can say, with absolute truthfulness, that I did not injure her.
sentence.Network_cn: 我可以绝对坦率地说，我没有伤害她。

sentence.Network_en: You do not go out to injure opponents.
It can be no light matter for the Home Office that so many young prisoners should have wanted to kill or injure themselves.
sentence.Network_cn: 竟然有那么多的年轻囚犯试图自杀或自残，内政部决不可等闲视之。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: back-formation from injury

entry.def: If you injure a person or animal, you damage some part of their body.

example.ex: A number of bombs have exploded, seriously injuring at least five people...
example.tran: 数个炸弹爆炸,造成至少5人重伤。

example.ex: Several policemen were injured in the clashes.
example.tran: 几名警察在冲突中受伤。

means.word_mean: 1. cause injuries or bodily harm to

sentences.sentence: "She hurt me when she did not include me among her guests"
"Our business was hurt by the new competition"

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Anything was right that might injure the authorities.

auth_sentence.content: She appeared to injure her leg and did not finish.
auth_sentence.res_content: She appeared to injure her leg and did not finish.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She appeared to injure her leg and did not finish.

auth_sentence.content: They weren't shooting to try and injure them or to disperse them.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 法律上的,有关权利义务的
stems_affixes.word_buile: jur发誓,法律;正确,正直+al……的→adj.法律上的,有关权利义务的
jur发誓,法律;正确,正直+y人→发誓的人→陪审团
ab离开+jure=jur发誓,法律;正确,正直→发誓离开→放弃→誓绝
con全部+jure=jur发誓,法律;正确,正直→全部发誓→恳求别人;引申为变魔术
in不+jur发誓,法律;正确,正直+e→不法行为→伤害[别人]

Sentence.sentence: Worst of all, when her son, Ned, fell and injured his knee, she refused to pay for a doctor and spent hours looking for free medical help.
He remembered some talk about his mother having been injured several days before he had been born
She was injured in a car accident two weeks ago and still in critical condition.
The 1976 copy right act has not prevented these abuses fully, but it has clarified the legal rights of the injured parties and given them an avenue for remedy.
She injured her spine in a fall and a doctor told her to lie flat on her back for a month so it can mend.

jushi.chinese: 那封信伤了她的自尊心。

jushi.english: He injured his left hand in a fire.
